# js_export (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "js_const" "message" {
  name  = "message"
  value = "hello world"
}

data "js_export" "message" {
  value = data.js_const.message.id
}
# => export message
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `value` (Dynamic) Value to be exported

### Read-Only

- `statement` (String)
